Instance Method# first(where:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func first(where predicate: (Publishers.Sequence<Elements, Failure>.Output) -> Bool) -> Optional<Publishers.Sequence<Elements, Failure>.Output>.Publisher
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `Sequence` and `Failure` is `Never`.## [See Also](/documentation/Combine/Publishers/Sequence/first(where:)#see-also)
